metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26981 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Liblouis through 3.21.0 has a buffer overflow in compilePassOpcode in compileTranslationTable.c (called, indirectly, by tools/lou_checktable.c).

notes.Note: leosilva> fix for the issue in focal causes regressions

criterions.comment: liblouis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
